modShortDescription: Khzmusik's edits for some mods are here for you. These edits makes important changes to some different mods you use. NPC Hire Text, Remove Ghost and more.
modDescription:
Khzmusik’s edits for some mods are here for you. These edits makes important changes to some different mods you use.

## Mods for SphereII DMT Mods

These are modifications to [SphereII mods](https://7daystodiemods.com/dmt-mods-by-sphereii/). These mods require DMT. (Khzmusik’s mods are XML/XPath only.)

Thanks to SphereII for making these incredibly useful mods!

### Remove Enemy Health Bar

Switches off the enemy health bar that is introduced in the SphereII Core mod.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=0-SphereIICore_Remove_Enemy_Health_Bar)**

### NPC Hire Text

Sets the NPC hire text to “I would like you to join me.” This makes more sense if you modify the NPCs to “hire” them using something other than Dukes, like canned food or medical supplies. (This mod does not do that, it only changes the text.)

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=SphereII%20NPC%20Dialog%20Windows_Hire_Text)**

## NPC Mods

These mods affect the NPCs that are added by the [Creature Pack](https://7daystodiemods.com/creature-packs-a-community-entity-project/) mods (which do not require DMT), or the [DMT NPC](https://7daystodiemods.com/npcs-mod/) mods (which require DMT and add extra behavior), or both.

Huge thanks to Xyth for creating the mods, and to all the people who created the NPCs themselves (including Xyth, Guppy, DarkStarDragon, and probably more by the time you read this).

### NPCPackHumans: Adjust Health and Stamina

Adjusts the health and stamina of human NPCs to be closer to player values. For more details, please see the [README](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/blob/master/1-NPCPackHumans_Adjust_Health_Stamina/README.md).

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=1-NPCPackHumans_Adjust_Health_Stamina)**

### NPCPackHumans: Adjust Hire Costs

Adjusts the hire costs of human NPCs. For more details, please see the [README](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/blob/master/1-NPCPackHumans_Adjust_Hire_Costs/README.md).

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=1-NPCPackHumans_Adjust_Hire_Costs)**

### CreaturePackHumans/NPCPackHumans: Remove Ghost

Removes the Ghost (Motoko Kusanagi) NPC character from all spawn groups. For more details, please see the [README](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/blob/master/2-CreaturePackHumans_Remove_Ghost/README.md).

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=2-CreaturePackHumans_Remove_Ghost)**

### CreaturePackHumans/NPCPackHumans: Remove Harley

Removes the Harley Quinn NPC character from all spawn groups. For more details, please see the [README](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/blob/master/2-CreaturePackHumans_Remove_Harley/README.md).

_**Note:** This mod is currently unnecessary, since she is was not ported from Xyth’s old NPC mod to the Creature Pack. Khzmusik is including it here in case it her character is added to a later version._

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=2-CreaturePackHumans_Remove_Harley)**

### CreaturePackHumans/NPCPackHumans: Remove NPC Tracking

Removes tracking of human NPCs in the game map. For more details, please see the [README](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/blob/master/2-CreaturePackHumans_Remove_NPC_Tracking/README.md).

_**Note:** This mod is currently unnecessary, since tracking is disabled by default. Khzmusik is including it here in case it is enabled in a later version._

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=2-CreaturePackHumans_Remove_NPC_Tracking)**

### NPCPackHumans: Adjust Sounds

Adjusts the sounds and dialog made by human NPCs. For more details, please see the [README](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/blob/master/2-NPCPackHumans_AdjustSounds/README.md).

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=2-NPCPackHumans_AdjustSounds)**

### CreaturePackHumans: Add to Vanilla Spawn Groups

Adds Creature Pack humans to vanilla spawn groups. For more details, please see the [README](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/blob/master/1-CreaturePackHumans_Add_To_Vanilla_Spawns/README.md).

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=1-CreaturePackHumans_Add_To_Vanilla_Spawns)**

### NPCPackHumans: Add to Vanilla Spawn Groups

Adds NPCPack humans to vanilla spawn groups. For more details, please see the [README](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/blob/master/2-NPCPackHumans_Add_To_Vanilla_Spawns/README.md).

_**Note:** Compatible with the Creature Pack version, above._

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=2-NPCPackHumans_Add_To_Vanilla_Spawns)**

## Deprecated Mods for Xyth NPCs

These are modifications to the original NPC mods created by Xyth. He has now deprecated these mods in favor of the Creature Pack and NPCPack mods. Khzmusik is including them here in case you still use Xyth’s old mods – but Khzmusik recommend switching to Creature Pack or NPCPack mods as soon as possible.

Nearly all of them have equivalent mods for Creature Pack or NPCPack, and Khzmusik is working on updating the few that don’t.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=Xyth%20Bandits_Add_To_Zombie_Spawns)** Add Bandits To Zombie Spawns  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=Xyth%20NPCs_Add_To_Zombie_Spawns)** Add NPCs To Zombie Spawns  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=Xyth%20NPCs_Reduce_Hire_Costs)** Reduce NPC Hire Costs  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=Xyth%20NPCs_Reduce_HP)** Reduce NPC Hit Points  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=Xyth%20NPCs_Remove_Ghost)** Remove Ghost  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=Xyth%20NPCs_Remove_Harley)** Remove Harley  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-modlets-master.zip?path=Xyth%20NPCs_Remove_NPC_Tracking)** Remove NPC Tracking

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17014-khzmusiks-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Khzmusik](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khzmusik/)
